targets.expr:
(sum(rate(http_request_total{app="$project", kubernetes_namespace="$ns", code=~"^2..$"}[$interval])) OR on() vector(0) + 
sum(rate(http_request_total{app="$project", kubernetes_namespace="$ns", code=~"^3..$"}[$interval])) OR on() vector(0) + 
sum(rate(http_request_total{app="$project", kubernetes_namespace="$ns", code=~"^4..$"}[$interval])) OR on() vector(0))
/ 
sum(rate(http_request_total{app="$project", kubernetes_namespace="$ns"}[$interval]))
